'''Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation''' is a two-player board game, made in 2013<ref>https://www.fantasyflightgames.com/en/news/2013/11/27/return-to-middle-earth/</ref> by [[Fantasy Flight Games]] in which one player controls the [[Fellowship of the Ring]] and the other player wields the forces of [[Sauron]].<ref>https://www.fantasyflightgames.com/en/products/lord-of-the-rings-the-confrontation/</ref>

It features art from [[Daarken]], [[Chris Dien]], [[John Gravato]], [[John Howe]], [[Michael Komarck]] and [[Sedone Thongvilay]].
